CHAT.comment: WILLIAM G. SCHWAB, Petitioner v. NADEJDA REILLY.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:01 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CRAIG G. GOLDBLATT ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY B. WALL ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF G. ERIC BRUNSTAD, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF CRAIG G. GOLDBLATT ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:03 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
